comments.body: Fix prop types to `string` because `StrictJsonBigInt.parse` converts `creation_timestamp` and `last_updated_timestamp` to string (from int64).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@      name: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
      creation_timestamp: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
      last_updated_timestamp: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
    }),
    modelVersions: PropTypes.arrayOf(

comments.body:
To test for ModelView.js:

* Compare button behavior (call `setState` on a shallow-rendered `ModelView` & call onCompare, verify that `props.history.push` is called with appropriate args). This will require mocking out `props.history.push` as a `jest.fn()`. You can see an example of that [here](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/branch-1.5/mlflow/server/js/src/components/MetricsPlotPanel.test.js#L68), and examples of how to assert that a `jest.fn` was called with arguments in the [API docs](https://jestjs.io/docs/en/expect#tohavebeencalledwitharg1-arg2-)
* Compare button disabled after `setState` to have no runs selected, active when runs are selected
